item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is a new location:
Kelly's

Kelly's is one of the newer Irish pubs in the area, located near the corner of Crown and Temple under the Kelly House apartments. (at the former location of the Marius.) There is of course the Irish wood work at the bar, a nice fireplace decor in the dinning room, and for those that want to get a table the patio. (Sorry, I was unable to get us special consideration on the patio, though I'm sure they'll seat you on their half if you like.) The menu features a mix of a few old Irish favorites (I hear the Fish and Chips has been Englishman approved at least) and more common american fare.

Happy hour specials are served from 4-7 p.m. and include:
$3/4 Beers
$5 House Wine
$5 House Martinis
Free nibbles will be put out in the bar area.
(I'll see if I can convince them to extend the specials later, but no guarantees at this point.)

I (AJ) will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348.

For more information about the Pub:
www.kellysnewhaven.com

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour: Kelly's
